property.description:
Click to display report description

    Please note that these reports utilize the VIPR SRM Chargeback data points. Ensure you have the Chargeback SolutionPack installed and running as well as have your hosts discovered (actively or passively). Be sure you have met all of the prerequisites before running this report.

  • Presented Capacity maps to the Primary Presented Capacity chargeback metrics and represents the LUN size(s) presented to hosts.
  • Used Capacity maps to the Primary Used Capacity chargeback metrics and represents the LUN(s) used capacity value provided by the array. If a LUN is thick provisioned used capacity will show the full presented capacity.
  • Delta columns represent the delta between the previous (x) day metric (last 1 day metric of defined period) of the Primary Presented/Used Chargeable Capacity and the current Primary Presented/Used Chargeable Capacity metric.
    •

property.filterExpression: w4ncert=='1.0' & !(vstatus=='inactive') & #APG:ALL & source=='Chargeback-block-processor' & (devtype=='Host' | devtype=='PassiveHost' & !(actdisc=='1') | devtype=='Hypervisor' | devtype=='VirtualMachine') & (name='Used%' | name='Presented%')

property.name: Host
property.description: Name of the Host.

property.name: Host Type
property.description: Type of host; values can be - Host, Hypervisor, PassiveHost

property.name: Resolved IP
property.description: The IP address of the host.

property.name: Presented - Current
property.description: Current sum of Primary Presented Chargeable Capacity of all the host disks. It is deduplicated by shared capacity.

property.name: Used Capacity - Current
property.description: Current sum of Primary Presented Used Capacity of all the host disks. It is deduplicated by shared capacity.

property.name: Used Delta - Last 30 Days
property.description: Delta between previous (x) day metric (Last 1 day metric of the last day on the month/quarter/6 months) and the current Primary Presented/Used Chargeable Capacity metric.

property.name: Used Delta - Last 90 Days
property.description: Delta between previous (x) day metric (Last 1 day metric of the last day on the month/quarter/6 months) and the current Primary Presented/Used Chargeable Capacity metric.

property.name: Used Delta - Last 180 Days
property.description: Delta between previous (x) day metric (Last 1 day metric of the last day on the month/quarter/6 months) and the current Primary Presented/Used Chargeable Capacity metric.

property.name: Last Timestamp
property.description: The most recent date/time that this key performance indicator has been collected.

property.filterExpression: w4ncert=='1.0' & !(vstatus=='inactive') & #APG:ALL & source=='Chargeback-block-processor' & (devtype=='Host' | devtype=='PassiveHost' & !(actdisc=='1') | devtype=='Hypervisor' | devtype=='VirtualMachine') & (name='Used%' | name='Presented%')

node.name: Capacity Trend Graphs by Service Level

property.name: Host
property.description: Name of the Host.

property.name: Host Type
property.description: Type of host; values can be - Host, Hypervisor, PassiveHost

property.name: Resolved IP
property.description: The IP address of the host.

property.name: Primary Presented Chargeable
property.description: Sum of primary presented Chargeable Capacity of all the host disks. It is deduplicated by shared capacity.

property.name: Primary Used Chargeable
property.description: Sum of primary used Chargeable Capacity of all the host disks. It is deduplicated by shared capacity.

property.name: Present Chargeable Cost ($)
property.description: The Chargeable cost for the host based on primary presented chargeable capacity. It is deduplicated by shared capacity.

property.name: Used Chargeable Cost ($)
property.description: The Chargeable cost for the host based on primary used chargeable capacity. Its deduplicated by shared capacity.

property.name: Last Timestamp
property.description: The most recent date/time that this key performance indicator has been collected.
For the capacity to be assigned to a service-level, the LUN providing the storage must be monitored (in the last 24h)

property.name: Host Device
property.description: WWN or name of the Disk.

property.name: Array Name
property.description: Name of the Array. Its set to N/A when the array is not discovered.

property.name: LUN ID
property.description: Identifier for each LUN.Its set to N/A when the array is not discovered.

property.name: Service Level
property.description: Service level that the LUN is tagged with. When array is not discovered, SL is set to "Other". The service level is set to "VirtualStorage" when the Virtual storage array is discovered but backend array is not discovered and when the LUNs backing the virtual volume are tagged with different service levels.

property.name: Primary Presented
property.description: Presented capacity for the primary LUN or Virtual Volume allocated to the host. If the array or virtual storage is not discovered, it is the host disk used capacity.

property.name: Primary Used
property.description: Used Capacity of the primary LUN. If the array is not discovered, its the host disk used capacity.

property.name: Connected Hosts
property.description: List of all hosts connected to that LUN or virtual volume.

property.name: Primary Presented Chargeable
property.description: The Primary presented Chargeable Capacity for the host deduplicated by shared capacity. It is Primary presented capacity split equally between all the hosts sharing the LUN.

property.name: Primary Used Chargeable
property.description: The Chargeable Capacity for the disk deduplicated by shared capacity. It is is Primary used capacity split equally between all the hosts sharing the LUN.

property.name: LUN Monitored
property.description: Indicates when the LUN allocated to the given disk has/has not been discovered.

property.name: Virtual Storage Monitored
property.description: Indicates when the VPLEX/SVC Virtual Volume allocated to the given disk has/has not been discovered.
For the capacity to be assigned to a service-level, the LUN providing the storage must be monitored (in the last 24h)

property.name: Disk
property.description: Name of the Disk.

property.name: WWN
property.description: The world wide number of the LUN.

property.name: Array Name
property.description: Name of the Array. Its set to N/A when the array is not discovered.

property.name: LUN ID
property.description: Identifier for each LUN. Its set to N/A when the array is not discovered.

property.name: Service Level
property.description: Service level that the LUN is tagged with. When array is not discovered, SL is set to "Other". The service level is set to "VirtualStorage" when the Virtual storage array is discovered but backend array is not discovered and when the LUNs backing the virtual volume are tagged with different service levels.

property.name: Primary Presented
property.description: Presented Capacity of the primary LUN or the virtual volume allocated to the VM. If the array or virtual storage is not discovered, it is equal to the RDM used capacity.

property.name: Primary Used
property.description: Used Capacity of the primary LUN or the virtual volume allocated to the VM. If the array or virtual storage is not discovered, it is equal to the RDM used capacity.

property.name: Connected VMs
property.description: List of all Virtual machines connected to that LUN or virtual volume.

property.name: Primary Presented Chargeable
property.description: The Primary Presented Capacity of the disk deduplicated by shared capacity. It is Primary Presented capacity split equally between all the Virtual machines sharing the LUN.

property.name: Primary Used Chargeable
property.description: The Primary used Capacity of the disk deduplicated by shared capacity. It is Primary used capacity split equally between all the Virtual machines sharing the LUN.

property.name: LUN Monitored
property.description: Indicates when the LUN allocated to the given disk has/has not been discovered.

property.name: Virtual Storage Monitored
property.description: Indicates when the VPLEX/SVC Virtual Volume allocated to the given disk has/has not been discovered.

property.name: device
property.description: Name of the device.
For the capacity to be assigned to a service-level, the LUN providing the storage must be monitored (in the last 24h)

property.name: File Name
property.description: Name of the vmdk file.

property.name: Datastore
property.description: Name of the datastore.

property.name: VDisk Name
property.description: Name of the virtual disk.

property.name: Is RDM Definition?
property.description: Is raw device mapping enabled; values are Yes or No.

property.name: Service Level
property.description: Service level that the LUN is tagged with. When array is not discovered, SL is set to "Other". The service level is set to "VirtualStorage" when the Virtual storage array is discovered but backend array is not discovered and when the LUNs backing the virtual volume are tagged with different service levels.

property.name: Primary Presented
property.description: It is the capacity of the VMDK file.

property.name: Primary Used
property.description: It is the used capacity of the VMDK file.

property.name: Connected VMs
property.description: List of all virtual machines connected to that LUN.

property.name: Primary Presented Chargeable
property.description: The Chargeable Capacity for the VMDK file deduplicated by shared capacity. It is Primary presented capacity split equally between all the virtual machines sharing the LUN.

property.name: Primary Used Chargeable
property.description: The Chargeable Capacity for the VMDK file deduplicated by shared capacity. It is Primary used capacity split equally between all the virtual machines sharing the LUN.

property.name: LUN Monitored
property.description: Indicates when the LUN allocated to the given disk has/has not been discovered.

property.name: Virtual Storage Monitored
property.description: Indicates when the VPLEX/SVC Virtual Volume allocated to the given disk has/has not been discovered.

property.name: Backing Storage WWN
property.description: The World Wide Name of the backing storage device.

property.name: Is Monitored
property.description: Indicates if the backing storage Array LUN/Virtual Volume is monitored or not.

node.name: VMDK File Link Direct To LUN

property.name: Host
property.description: Name of the Host.

property.name: Host Type
property.description: Type of host; values can be - Host, Hypervisor, PassiveHost

property.name: Resolved IP
property.description: The IP address of the host.

property.name: Presented - Current
property.description: Current sum of Primary Presented Chargeable Capacity of all the host disks. It is deduplicated by shared capacity.

property.name: Used Capacity - Current
property.description: Current sum of Primary Presented Used Capacity of all the host disks. It is deduplicated by shared capacity.

property.name: Presented Delta - Last 30 Days
property.description: Delta between previous 30 day sum of Primary Presented Chargeable Capacity and the current sum of Primary Presented Chargeable Capacity.

property.name: Presented Delta - Last 90 Days
property.description: Delta between previous 90 day sum of Primary Presented Chargeable Capacity and the current sum of Primary Presented Chargeable Capacity.

property.name: Presented Delta - Last 180 Days
property.description: Delta between previous 180 day sum of Primary Presented Chargeable Capacity and the current sum of Primary Presented Chargeable Capacity.

property.name: Last Timestamp
property.description: The most recent date/time that this key performance indicator has been collected.
